ch.zhaw.iamp.rct

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.iamp.rct.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends Object
    This controller class triggers application wide reactions such as opening/closing frames.

    • Method Detail

      • showMainWindow

        public void showMainWindow()
        Shows the MainWindow. If there is no instance yet, one will be created.

      • showGrammarWindow

        public void showGrammarWindow()
        Shows the GrammarWindow. If there is no instance yet, one will be created.

      • showGrammarHelpWindow

        public void showGrammarHelpWindow(int xPosition,
                         int yPosition)
        Shows the GrammarHelpWindow. If there is no instance yet, one will be created.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - The x position at which the window may be put.
        yPosition - The y position at which the window may be put.

      • isGrammarHelpWindowVisible

        public boolean isGrammarHelpWindowVisible()
        Returns:
        true, when the GrammarHelpWindow is visible, false otherwise.

      • showInitialisationHelpWindow

        public void showInitialisationHelpWindow(int xPosition,
                                int yPosition)
        Shows the InitialisationHelpWindow. If there is no instance yet, one will be created.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - The x position at which the window may be put.
        yPosition - The y position at which the window may be put.

      • getInitialisationHelpWindow

        public InitialisationHelpWindow getInitialisationHelpWindow()
        Returns:
        true, when the InitialisationHelpWindow is visible, false otherwise.

      • isInitialisationHelpWindowVisible

        public boolean isInitialisationHelpWindowVisible()
        Returns:
        true, when the InitialisationHelpWindow is visible, false otherwise.

      • loadGraphFromFile

        public void loadGraphFromFile()
        Loads the mass-spring network graph from the masses file and the connection map file, as configured in the LoadGraphWindow.

      • showLoadGraphWindow

        public void showLoadGraphWindow()
        Shows the LoadGraphWindow. If there is no instance yet, one will be created.

      • isLoadGraphWindowVisible

        public boolean isLoadGraphWindowVisible()
        Returns:
        true, when the LoadGraphWindow is visible, false otherwise.

      • isGraphWindowVisible

        public boolean isGraphWindowVisible()
        Returns:
        true, when the GrammarWindow is visible, false otherwise.

      • showWeightsCalculatorWindow

        public void showWeightsCalculatorWindow()
        Shows the WeightsCalculatorWindow. If there is no instance yet, one will be created.

      • calculateWeights

        public void calculateWeights()
        Calculates the weights configured in WeightsCalculatorWindow and writes the result to the also configure output file.

      • showAboutWindow

        public void showAboutWindow()
        Shows the AboutWindow. If there is no instance yet, one will be created.

      • isAboutWindowVisible

        public boolean isAboutWindowVisible()
        Returns:
        true, when the AboutWindow is visible, false otherwise.
